full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO'I BLO SBYONG BLO BZANG DGONGS RGYAN GYI RTZA TSIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,CES THEG PA CHEN PO'I BLO SBYONG BLO BZANG DGONGS RGYAN GYI SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I RTZA TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MDO SNGAGS GZHUNG BRGYA SMRA BA'I BSHES GNYEN DAR GLING MKHAN PO RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS DBANG RGYA MTSOS BSKUL BZHING, RANG DANG SKAL BA @016B MNYAM PA DAG LA PHAN DU RE BA'I BSAM PAS DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THEG PA CHEN PO'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
